snippet.title: Chucky Mendoza And The Curse Of The Pharaoh -- TRAILER
snippet.description:
Trailer for Chucky Mendoza and the Curse of the Pharaoh. 
Chucky Mendoza and the Curse of the Pharaoh is an old school platformer game inspired by 80's 8-Bit retro games on classic computers like the C64. Run across screen, jump over obstacles, collect treasures throughout a cursed pyramid, avoid tripmines, lava pits and various deadly enemies (including bats, mummies, bugs, cobras) along the way.
For PC/MAC by {ths}. Available Summer 2013 at www.ths.nu
